abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33136157, pmid33107708, pmid33112002, pmid33135884, pmid33124438, pmid33108380, pmid33119738, pmid33104179, pmid33119763, pmid33119733, pmid33095516, pmid33104988, pmid33124606, pmid33113270
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.11.04
